song_lyric:
作曲 : T.Aaron田屹松
 作词 : PISSY
Hey girl,
 I know you are sadHey，
Nightmares are always there
Now listen
It gon be okay
Don’t be afraid
I’ll be right here
I know you always feeling bad
Every time u hate me doing that
Now plz trust me more than you can
Cuz we are just bout to
Start it right now

Girl what u ask for
Stay
Cut it off with that sword
Say，My massive ego carry more
Weight than the broomsticks
Flying with that Harry Potter
Can’t ignore all the feelings that u got for me
Hey,
 is there something I can do,
 ready
But u,
 pretty,
 really cuz u,
 lady
Why u still ain’t happy
Nah,
 null
Crazy every time,
 ain’t it?
Cool,
 let’s make this thing straight yeah
I hear u talking
U dont feel that safe
U know it’s nonsense
When we were fighting
And we ain’t conscious
Spitting all the bullsh*t
Spreading all the rages,
 contagious
Love be ambiguous
What tedious means
3 centimeter from happiness
That’s all it matters within
When u do care bout me
Then u get disappointed
But when I fix it,
 unfreezing
We win the ticket to it

Now Hold my hands with sunrise
Now Hold my hands with sun down
Now Hold my hands and we see the light
We don’t know if we are gonna make it right

 I know you are sadHey，

Hold up,
 know u got a lota questions
Zoe
I know I never meet your satisfaction
Alright
There’s always distance between your life and dreaming
Tat’s how u divide your life and dreaming
As how I provide with u
All my heart and feeling
Romanticism,

Poetry with some realism
Real reason is that
Now so many other boys they
Play around with 3 girls
The same fucking moment
They fuck their fans
I mean they rappers
We are not same

Just a pet blogger,
 c’est ca
Trying to be MAN

Or some other drug-addicted
Don’t be afraid

Don’t be defeated by other typical types
And assume it applied on yourself
To just feel the vibe

They none of your business
